Message:
“I’m glad I was able to
see you in the end.
Goodbye, Lumica...
You’ll always be
my best friend...”

Just as I tried to put my arms
around Grita’s fading body...

she transformed into
specks of light.

All that remained
was a single feather.

I picked it up and
grasped it tightly.

The time you and I
spent together was
the happiest I’ve ever been.
Thanks...for being my friend...

Thank you...
for coming into my life...!

You’ll forever be...
my very best friend,
Grita...!
Phwaaah...! What a good nap...
Wait, why am I sleeping outside?!

And it’s sunset already?!
But, I was planning on
going to the lake
with Grita today!
Grita...hmm...isn’t here...

Did she go off somewhere
trying to look for me,
or something?

Huh...? I’m holding something...
Is this...a feather?

Blown off by the wind,
the feather turned into
a speck of light,
then twinkled and disappeared...
How pretty...

Why...does my chest
feel so tight, it hurts...?

Am I sad that I didn’t get to
go to the lake with Grita...?

This is weird...
We could go tomorrow,
or the day after that,
or really any time at all...
So, why...?

Suddenly, tears began to
stream down my cheeks.

I don’t know
why I’m crying, but...

Yeah... I’ll just let
myself cry a while.
Because, it feels like I should.

Yesterday was so fun,
wasn’t it?

Today...is coming to an end,
so let’s try again tomorrow!

And just like that,
we’ll keep being
friends forever, Grita...!
